question: What does AR stand for?

answers: b) Providing real-time feedback on player performance

question: Which of these is a common use case for VR in training?
answers: a) Providing interactive simulations of real-world scenarios
c) Creating virtual tours of museums

answers: a) To project images onto a wall

answers: b) Accurately tracking the real world
